title: bossshoppro按键配置中键没反应
author: lian123456
txt_content:
配置如下。左键和右键OK,中键没反应


TreeDiagramD3:
    MenuItem:
    - name:&e&l[x] 商 城 [x]
    - 'lore:&2左键&2&5进入商城列表#&3右键&3&5进入魔法师#&4中键&4&5进入幸运屋'
    - type:emerald
    - amount:1
    RewardType_left: shop
    Reward_left: shoplist
    PriceType_left: NOTHING
    RewardType_right: playercommand
    Reward_right: 
    - ccrate
    PriceType_right: NOTHING
    RewardType_Middle: playercommand
    Reward_Middle: 
    - CrazyEnchantments
    PriceType_Middle: NOTHING
    ExtraPermission: ''
    InventoryLocation: 30

replies.author: apacheii
replies.txt_content: 客户端是不是装了一键整理,一键整理里可能设置了中键一键整理,变成了点击中键移动物品,造成误判.

replies.author: lian123456
replies.txt_content:
apacheii 发表于 2019-8-6 09:14
客户端是不是装了一键整理,一键整理里可能设置了中键一键整理,变成了点击中键移动物品,造成误判. ...
纯净客户端
